Just to ask. If I pick up and send to destination. However no ppl at home and no contact number. I call the sender they ask me send back item.Whatâ€™s the correct procedure or wad can I do. Please advise
Even sender got no way to contact receiver.
I told the sender that my duty is to send the parcel from location A to location B. However if B not at home or in contactable not my issue. I ardy steady waited 15-20mins.The live chat also useless.
Guys how to cashout lalamove money? and how long will i receive

If sender ask u bring back  there will be extra charge for extra stop and distance travelled. If sender is based in cbd area  also have extra charge for cbd stop. Either u inform Cs abt this and they add it in  or u can private settle with sender to pay u the extra $
Another way is norm if No1 hm  I will hang the item at the door n take photo to cover ass. N inform the sender.
But I haven't encounter this situation b4 whereby the sender ask me to bring back. But the extra charges are definitely ur right to claim
If u withdraw tdy or anytime this wk  the money will get nxt wed. So I norm withdraw on Sunday night after I knock off
